section.title: Development Team
section.p:
The jManage development team can be contacted by sending an email to team@jmanage.org.
If you have a support request, please enter it here, and we will work on it in a timely manner.

section.title: jManage Users
section.p:
The jManage users can be contacted by sending an email to jmanage-users@lists.sourceforge.net.
You can also join this distribution list
here.
